from collections.abc import Mapping
from itertools import chain
from operator import add
#ignore FutureWarning messages 
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore", message="iteritems is deprecated")
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
from pprint import pprint as pp
import json
import pyspark.sql.functions as F 
import pandas as pd
from pyspark.sql.types import *

from notebookutils import mssparkutils
### mount the data lake storage in Synapse to the Synapse File Mount API
jobId = mssparkutils.env.getJobId()
storage_acc_name = spark.sparkContext.environment.get('dataLakeAccountName', 'get')
mssparkutils.fs.unmount("/zendesk_items") 
mssparkutils.fs.mount( 
"abfss://odw-raw@"+storage_acc_name+".dfs.core.windows.net/ZenDesk/Export/",
"/zendesk_items", 
{"linkedService":"ls_storage"}

from notebookutils import mssparkutils
### mount the data lake storage in Synapse to the Synapse File Mount API
jobId = mssparkutils.env.getJobId()
storage_acc_name = spark.sparkContext.environment.get('dataLakeAccountName', 'get')
mssparkutils.fs.unmount("/zendesk_new_items") 
mssparkutils.fs.mount( 
"abfss://odw-raw@"+storage_acc_name+".dfs.core.windows.net/ZenDesk/ServiceBus/",
"/zendesk_new_items", 
{"linkedService":"ls_storage"}

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession 
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate() 
storage_acc_name = spark.sparkContext.environment.get('dataLakeAccountName', 'get')
shows = spark.read.json("abfss://odw-raw@"+storage_acc_name+".dfs.core.windows.net/ZenDesk/Export/output_*.json",multiLine=True)
shows_new = spark.read.json("abfss://odw-raw@"+storage_acc_name+".dfs.core.windows.net/ZenDesk/ServiceBus/**/*.json",multiLine=True)

# Create mega table
shows = shows.withColumn('IngestionDate', F.current_timestamp())
shows_new = shows.withColumn('IngestionDate', F.current_timestamp())
combined_df = shows.union(shows_new)
combined_df.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_standardised_db.zendesk_system_extract;")
combined_df.write.format('delta').saveAsTable("odw_standardised_db.zendesk_system_extract")
